main.name: Aisha Adam
main.description: A Graduate Information Technology Student at the Arab Open University. I have experience in web development and implementation of technical work,I like searching and learning new technologies such as applications of artificial intelligence and data science.  I aim to utilize my technical and managerial experiences to get a suitable job opportunity.
main.bio: My name is Aisha, I'm a Junior Web Developer. I have web development skills specializing in front end development and use of various frameworks. Strong background in programming languages including Python, Java, PHP,C#, SQL.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
